result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher James Gouge

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Christopher James Gouge in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough.  Aaron B Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 14 CM 312, 14 CM 351 and 15 cm 282.  9:43 AM  Court calls case and recites appearances.  State recites plea agreement:
14 CM 312 - NC - and 14 CM 351 and 15 CM 279 and(15CM 282 DRI) - probation 18 months - 60 days county jail concurrent - absolute sobriety - costs 19 days credit as of today.  Atty Schlough agrees as does the defendant.   Court questions defendant as to plea questionnaire.  Plea of NC to counts 14 CM 312, 14 CM 351 and 15 CM 279.  Court finds defendant guilty 14 CM 312, 14 CM 351 and 15 CM 279.  15 CM 282 is dismissed and read in.  State argues sentencing.  Atty Schlough argues sentencing.  Defendant addressed the Court.

COURT: Dismissed and read-in

Defendant Christopher J. Gouge in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough via phone.  Aaron Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 15 CM 279, 15 CM 282 and 14 CM 351.  Atty Schlough addressed the Court never rec'd notice of hearing.  Atty Marcoux makes stmt.  Bond reinstated and warrant quashed.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 30, 2015 at 09:30 am.

Defendant Christopher James Gouge not in court with attorney Scott S. Schlough. Aaron Marcoux appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Also has 15 CM 312, 15 CM 279 and 14 CM 251.  10:10 AM  Court calls case and recites appearances.  State requests warrant and bail forfeiture hearing.  Court ordered warrants on all files and bail forfeiture proceedings to begin.  Signature bonds are vacated and enter assessment.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: combined on 15cm279 and 15cm282   NO CONTACT directly or indirectly with Thomas or Brenda Thompson or place of residence 9809 State Hwy N.

Defendant Christopher J. Gouge in court, in custody.  Bruce Robert Poquette appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case. Recites appearances. State's DEF appeared on warrant
Court questions DEF. State request cash bond.
Court orders cash bond of $500.00 same conditions as 14CM312 and 14CM351
